# pb.Method proto

args: {
  key: "auth-arg"
  value: {
    meta: {
      http: {
        auth: {
          type: BASIC
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

args: {
  key: "header-arg"
  value: {
    meta: {
      http: {
        header: {
          key: "X-My-Header"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

responses: {
  key: "body-resp"
  value: {
    struct: {
      fields: {
        key: "top-level-prop"
        value: {
          struct: {
            fields: {
              key: "my-special-prop"
              value: {}
            }
          }
        }
      }
      fields: {
        key: "other-top-level-prop"
        value: {
          primitive: {
            string_value: {
              type: {}
            }
            formats: {
              key: "rfc3339"
              value: true
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }

    meta: {
      http: {
        body: {
          content_type: JSON
        }
        response_code: 201
      }
    }
  }
}

meta: {
  http: {
    method: "post"  # intentionally lowercase to test case-insensitive match
    path_template: "/v1/projects/{arg3}"
    host: "example.com"
  }
}
